department: National Defense (DND) and Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
short_summary: Department of National Defence and Coast Guard Canada need fresh eggs delivered to delivery zones in Nova Scotia, Newfoundland and Labrador
description: Public Services and Procurement Canada have a requirement for the supply of fresh eggs on an as and when requested basis to various kitchens and vessels, over a period of one year
full_summary:
**Title** 
Eggs RFP - Master Standing Offer
=========================

**Reference-Numéro de référence** : WS3837028633
**Solicitation No-Numéro de sollicitation** : WS3837028633

**Publication-Date de publication** : February 2, 2023
**Closing Date-Date de clôture** : February 21, 2023, 14:00:00

**Contract Notice-Notice de contrat** : A Regional Master Standing Offer (RMSO) is sought for the supply of fresh eggs on an as-and-when-required basis to various government entities.

**Description-Besoins** : The Department of National Defence (DND) and Coast Guard Canada (CCG) require a reliable and timely supply of fresh eggs to their various locations, including static kitchens, vessels, and other facilities. The Standing Offer will cover the delivery zones in Newfoundland and Labrador and Nova Scotia.

**Procurement-Méthode d'approvisionnement** : The procurement will be conducted using a Request for Standing Offer (RFSS) method, through which multiple contractors will be invited to submit their proposals.

**Evaluation Criteria-Criteria d'évaluation** : Suppliers' responses will be evaluated based on their ability to meet the specifications, delivery requirements, and price.

**Additional Information-Information supplémentaire** :

*   The contract may cover the delivery of eggs to the Department of Fisheries and Oceans and other government agencies within the provinces listed above.
*   Suppliers must have a valid Canadian business number and be registered with the Procurement Strategy Agency (PSA).

**Contact-Contact** : Tara Sheppard, [tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Access the Opportunity-Consultez l'opportunité** : Log in to [SAP Ariba](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15302631) to view this opportunity.  [Download the solicitation document](<link_to_document>)
